projects.title: Intelligent Document Processing
projects.description: End-to-end ML pipeline for automated document classification and data extraction using transformer models.
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive document processing system that leverages state-of-the-art transformer models for classification and named entity recognition. The system processes over 10,000 documents daily with 95% accuracy.

projects.title: Real-time Analytics Platform
projects.description: Scalable data pipeline processing millions of events daily with real-time dashboards.
projects.longDescription: Designed and implemented a real-time analytics platform capable of ingesting, processing, and visualizing millions of events per day. Uses Apache Kafka for event streaming and Spark for batch processing.

projects.title: E-Commerce Mobile App
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile application with secure payments and real-time order tracking.
projects.longDescription: Full-stack mobile e-commerce solution with Flutter frontend, Node.js backend, and MongoDB database. Features include secure Stripe payments, real-time order tracking, and push notifications.

projects.title: Predictive Maintenance System
projects.description: IoT-based ML system predicting equipment failures with 95% accuracy.
projects.longDescription: IoT sensor data pipeline with machine learning models for predictive maintenance. Reduced unplanned downtime by 40% through early failure detection.

projects.title: Data Warehouse Solution
projects.description: Modern data warehouse architecture with automated ETL and BI integrations.
projects.longDescription: Enterprise data warehouse built on Snowflake with dbt transformations and Airflow orchestration. Enables self-service analytics for 500+ business users.

projects.title: SaaS Dashboard Platform
projects.description: Multi-tenant SaaS platform with role-based access and white-label capabilities.
projects.longDescription: White-label SaaS analytics dashboard built with Next.js and PostgreSQL. Features multi-tenancy, role-based access control, and customizable branding.

testimonials.content: Hubert's expertise in ML pipeline optimization significantly reduced our processing costs while improving accuracy. A true professional who understands both code and business impact.
testimonials.author: Sarah Chen

testimonials.content: Delivered a complex full-stack e-commerce solution ahead of schedule. The code quality was exceptional and the application has scaled flawlessly.
testimonials.author: Michael Ross

settings.heroSubtitle: AI & ML Engineer | End-to-End Data Solutions Architect | Full-Stack Mobile & Web Developer
settings.aboutContent: I design and deploy end-to-end AI and data solutions by integrating machine learning, analytics, and full-stack mobile and web development. With over three years of hands-on experience, I have consistently delivered reliable, production-ready systems with measurable project outcomes. My expertise spans the complete lifecycle of intelligent systems — from data ingestion, modeling, and optimization to scalable cloud deployment and user-focused application development. I specialize in transforming complex business and data challenges into secure, high-performance, and globally scalable digital solutions.
